description.value:
This silver ring is inscribed with symbols of good gods.

Ring Slot: Uncommon

Property:

Gain a +5 item bonus to saving throws against fear

Power âœ¦ Daily (Standard Action)

You gain concealment as billowing clouds of mist emerge from the ring. From these mists, you conjure the ghost knight. It occupies 1 square adjacent to you and moves with you. As a minor action, you can move the ghost knight to another adjacent square. The ghost knight (and the concealment) lasts until the end of the encounter. As a minor action, you can direct the knight to make a melee attack against a target adjacent to it. The attack bonus is equal to your level + 5 vs. Fortitude. On a hit, the attack deals 10 damage and pushes the target 1 square.
